#### Update peers
```
# Update peers in the config
PEERS="23116671a45dddfe581a1dd14c6d94170d44840a@176.9.39.118:26656,b0ec2c2e7cbc262308faaf678230bf354c3344f2@213.202.255.68:16656,577d86a40030c5d649b40c463a0367120d74b621@176.36.75.115:26656,3430ca86b2d781618dcc6132ca3e3419ea69568a@161.97.93.174:26656,ebaccf331df166fe6f5579d190d08776f8c5004d@45.67.212.83:26656,4703a6eaff8accb63fedc7b54313a460e1cabbf4@84.247.137.38:26656,04832883d0ae95974046494f559f4d7428c35cbd@185.40.79.58:26656,d8f3c4245005f77c0cb869b24cd733d9599a4a52@95.217.63.53:26656,344ba4690fe303aadc828d31328d0a8b3a127c98@207.180.236.138:16656,9a4581f34e1af328872ec71162a7ae76975f637f@156.67.29.89:26656,4d950bcd8e1885fae83c3003b23b91c2c43d888c@165.22.99.201:16656,2735dea46c2d8e814246c64f0b0d716ac966770f@166.1.70.240:26656,29faf995bdd64fccc0766ccd173797537e9587d7@31.220.100.221:26656,90fb16e5360d64ac2332009cfc7b2eb6e8df64e7@212.162.153.183:26656,66a25d8c4b6de583762d02def6e4d0f913f66ffa@15.235.144.20:47656" && \
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.0gchain/config/config.toml && \
sudo systemctl restart 0gchaind && sudo journalctl -u 0gchaind -f -o cat

```
```
curl -s localhost:26657/status | jq .result.sync_info
```
